useCase.name: View List of Interviews
useCase.description: User wants to view a list of interviews available.

preconditions.precondition: User is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The list of interviews is successfully displayed to the User.

useCase.trigger: User requests to view a list of interviews.

mainSequence.step: Interviews Page forwards the request to Backend Server.
Backend Server queries the Database for list of interviews.
Database returns the list of interviews to Backend Server.
Backend Server returns the list of interviews to Interviews Page.
Interviews Page displays the list of interviews to the User.
